attributes.action: Pay politicians and Government  employees a fair wage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A member of the Government should be there primarily for the benefit of the people - not their own wallet.
We should pay Government employees (including civil servants, members of Parliament, etc) a wage not above the national average. This will encourage them to help increase average earnings, rather than increase their own paycheck.

Keep the greedy out of the government.
"by the people, for people"
